hero.header:

hero.subtext: Welcome! It's good having you here with us at Pearl's Garden. We hope you enjoy the best of your selections.

about.subtext: Welcome to Pearl's Garden! We hope you enjoy the different fruits selections avaliable for the best of vitality you desire.

members.name: Oyebode Daniel.O
members.quote: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.

members.name: Fernadez Brown
members.quote: With God all things are possible.

members.name: Downie J.Hupkins
members.quote: The  King's Heart is in the hand of the Lord, as the rivers of water: He turneth it whithersoever He will.
